activities.name: Create Key Table
activities.description: Need to Factor in CDCType and Persist Staging Flag

activities.name: Get TenantId from Azure Key Vault

dependsOn.activity: Get TenantId from Azure Key Vault

body.value: @concat('grant_type=client_credentials&client_id=', pipeline().parameters.user, '@',activity('Get TenantId from Azure Key Vault').output.value ,'&client_secret=', activity('GetSecretValue').output.value, '&resource=00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/',pipeline().parameters.ServerName, '@', activity('Get TenantId from Azure Key Vault').output.value)
